column4: hello, is there anyone who wants to help me bring up a wireless network interface?
I am running Kubuntu 8.10 and I have a wireless card with acx111 driver
this driver doesn't support network manager
so i have to bring up the interface in the old fashioned way
imo that's the way yo configure your network
can you pastebin what you are doing with the iwconfig commands?
i myself use wpa_supplicant, ifplugd and guessnet to configure my wireless and wired netwerok
you could also use a post-up script
I'm just wondering why it doesn't work anymore, because it used to work with my /etc/network/interface file
I see you are german, maybe you are interessted in this page: http://www.aaron-spettl.de/ubuntu/dynamische-netzwerkkonfiguration.php
the example is with pre-up and post-down, but the idea is the same
I really like the german page, my setup is the same
